head.supplied: Melbourne bot Garden ¶ 3/5/69. ¶ Honored and dear Sir ¶ ¶ Much do I regret having missed your kind visit and that of Mr Grant & Mr Seller. From four til past 5 I stayed at the upper portion of Prince...

div.p: U69/3623, unit 428, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
Much do I regret having missed your kind visit and that of Mr Grant & Mr Seller. From four til past 5 I stayed at the upper portion of Princes Bridge, and yet you must have passed unobserved by me.

I feel much indebted for the interest you evince in the new work of the garden, and I hope, that at some leisure day, perhaps some Saturday afternoon or half day, you and your Lady will allow me the privilege to conduct you over the ground.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. von Mueller
McCulloch initialled M's letter.
